item.title: sanic
item.author: serialt
item.description: 一、Helloworld sanic 安装 python3 -m venv venv . venv/bin/activate pip3 install sanic helloworld from sanic import Sanic from sanic import text app = Sanic("Myapp") @app.route("/") async def test(request): return response.text('Hello World') if __name__ == '__main__': app.run(host="0.0.0.0", port=7777) vscode debug { "version": "0.2.0", "configurations": [ { "name": "Python Debugger: Current File", "type": "debugpy", "request": "launch", "python": "${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/python3", "program": "main.py",
